snippet.title: MD General Chaos
snippet.description:
One of the funniest war games ever made. EA should be proud of this Megadrive hit, General Chaos. Very good single player mode only surpassed by the 2 player coop or versus battle mode! Extremely humorous touches made this one special, and you hardly ever get tired of seeing such classics as jammed machine guns, instant rocket-to-skeleton kills, water bubbling flame throwers or winning a one-on-one fight, only to see the guy that fell pull his handgun and shoot us in the end. Priceless!

Chosen by Kotaku's Luke Plunkett  in his "Games That Made Me" list http://kotaku.com/5622277/the-games-that-made-me
